messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] hello from texas......
messages.msgSnippet: Kon nichi wa Andrea:  I am pleased 2 meet u my name is Jon Tsukiyo from California.  I just wanted 2 introduce myself, and say hello 2 u.  Happy day 4 u.
messages.messageBody:
Kon'nichi wa Andrea: I am pleased 2 meet u my name is Jon Tsukiyo from
California. I just wanted 2 introduce myself, and say hello 2 u. Happy day
4 u. Peace and love ... sayonara


----- Original Message -----
From: "andrea Smith" <andjoysmith@...>
To: <samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, March 20, 2003 23:50
Subject: Re: [samuraihistory] hello from texas......


> Hello, I'm Andrea, I'm too an admirer of the Japanese

> like Akira Kurasawa's, my most favorite movie that

> about Kagemusha I want to know about it, and as for

> myself, but I enjoy a good samurai movie from time to
> time.
>
>

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] hello from texas......
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, I m Andrea, I m too an admirer of the Japanese culture especially the samurai and bushido. I also like Akira Kurasawa s, my most favorite movie that
messages.messageBody:
Hello, I'm Andrea, I'm too an admirer of the Japanese
culture especially the samurai and bushido. I also
like Akira Kurasawa's, my most favorite movie that
Akira Kurasawa did is 7 samurai. Please tell me more
about Kagemusha I want to know about it, and as for
me, I'm a writer and I'm not a martial arts expert
myself, but I enjoy a good samurai movie from time to
time.


--- eelunico <eelunico@...> wrote:
> Hi to everyone, my name is manny, cuban in texas, an
> admirer. to say

messages.subject: hello from texas......
messages.msgSnippet: Hi to everyone, my name is manny, cuban in texas, an admirer. to say the least , of japanese culture, specially samurai.bushido...i am specially fond of Akira
messages.messageBody:
Hi to everyone, my name is manny, cuban in texas, an admirer. to say
the least , of japanese culture, specially samurai.bushido...i am
specially fond of Akira Kurasawa's work.. been seing his movies
sincce a kid back in Cuba.......anyhow, found this web looking for
kagemusha, a movie by kurasawa and felt like being pat of it..i am
an aircraft mechanic, no martial arts expert by no means...but boy I
enjoy samurai movies...!!!!!!!!
